data.title: Deezer Radio Stations
data.meta_description: Information FAQs   With over 32,000+ radio stations to browse, users in Brazil, France, Germany, Netherlands, Spain, the UK, the US,...
data.text:
With over 32,000+ radio stations to browse, users in Brazil, France, Germany, Netherlands, Spain, the UK, the US, South Africa and Israel can enjoy music radio and talk radio. From chart music to sport, midnight shows and news, you'll find a world of live radio.

Jump to section:

How to find radio stations

How to find radio stations

Note: The radio stations icon will not be available for users in the UK, US, South Africa and Israel or for iOS users. Follow the alternative method to find radio stations in these countries for Android and Desktop

From the Explore tab, scroll through the Experience rail and select Radio

Choose the station you would like to listen to from our dedicated channel, with personal recommendations and content picked by our team of editors

Note: You can find all the best radio stations here

From the Explore tab, scroll through the Experience rail and select Radio

Choose the station you would like to listen to from the most popular radio stations in your country

Note: You can find all the best radio stations here

From the Explore tab, scroll through the Experience rail and select Radio

Choose the station you would like to listen to from the most popular radio stations in your country

Note: You can find all the best radio stations here

âˆ’

No, but our player automatically monitors certain radio stations and shows the current song playing on your chosen station. While the song is playing, you can add it to your favorites just the same as any other track you hear on Deezer.

+

Most radio stations broadcast adverts in order to keep them on air. These ads are run by the radio station, not Deezer.

+

It's possible the show, station or author's team have not added it to Deezer. Request for them to add it here.
